subject: Re: Radio interview about making a "Franks Box" type device
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hello Bill,

I suggest if this upsets you, you remove yourself from the forum if 
you do not wish to receive messages which are about the subject 
matter of this forum.  The show will be about "Franks Box" type 
devices.  I'm guessing you probably know what those are... otherwise 
you would not be here.

Have a GREAT day!

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Jon Holems <jon.hole@...> wrote:
>
> Mike,
>    
>   Would you please not use this board to spam shows.
>    
>   Thanks
>   -Bill
>   
> 
> "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>           This evening I will be the guest on the Lights Out! radio 
program 
> hosted by Peter Franz and Alexis Camarda from Long Island Society 
for 
> Paranormal Research. Peter Franz is also a co-host on TAPS Family 
> Radio. Last week Rosemary Ellen Guiley was their guest. You can 
hear 
> her interview on the archived show at 
> http://www.blogtalkradio.com/Lightsoutradio/
> 
> You can hear my interview on tonight's LIVE Lights Out! show at 8pm 
> Eastern time at:
